title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 77.4 - Access and inspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 77.4 - Access and inspection

State Regulations

In order to supervise the enforcement of the provisions of
article 7 of the Agriculture and Markets Law and any rules or regulations
adopted pursuant thereto, the commissioner or his duly authorized agents may, at any reasonable time, including but not limited to normal business hours, enter and inspect any municipal shelter or pound or any establishment under
contract with a municipality to provide pound or shelter
services. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
77.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
